oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Municipal support for local food
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakriainen, Salla
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Kiuruvesi in Finland represents an example where the town has taken an initiative and made a conscious decision for the use of local and organic food. This has more or less been carried out in all the municipal kitchens.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kakriainen, Salla (2005) Municipal support for local food. In: Kakriainen, Salla and von Essen, Hans (Eds.) Obstacles and solutions in use of local and organic food. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 44. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 65-69.
